net.jforum.entities

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jforum.entities.Post
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchPost

    public class Post
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents every message post in the system.
    Author:
    Rafael Steil
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
